titleStmt.title: The cittharn schoole, by Antony Holborne gentleman, and seruant to her most excellent Maiestie. Hereunto are added sixe short aers Neopolitan like to three voyces, without the instrument: done by his brother William Holborne
titleStmt.author: Holborne, Anthony, d. 1602.
Holborne, William. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Short, dwelling on Breadstreet hill at the signe of the Starre,
